activities.name: Copy YellowTexi Data To Rendered Dir
Copy From Bronze- Csv To Parquet
Copy From Bronze- Excel To Parquet

value.value:
@concat(activity('Filtered Metadata Row').output.Value[0].BronzeFolder
    , '/'
    , activity('Filtered Metadata Row').output.Value[0].Source
    , '/'
    , replace(pipeline().parameters.FileName
        , concat('.', activity('Filtered Metadata Row').output.Value[0].FileType)
        , ''
    )
    , '/'
    , replace(pipeline().parameters.FileName
        , activity('Filtered Metadata Row').output.Value[0].FileType
        , 'parquet'
    )
)

properties.description:
- How to copy all files from one Container/Directory to another place.
- ProcessID as an instruction to perform a specific task, if null then execute all else just the mentioned one.
- Refactoring some dataset naming convention.

- Pass Target file type to be a specific extension, e.g.  csv to parquet
- Avoid using GetMetadata inside forloop- in this case
- Instead of replacing the old files, move them to Archive/yyyy-mm-dd/filename_HHmmss
- Instead of replacing the old files, move them to Archive/yyyy-mm-dd/filename_HHmmss

- Instead of replacing the old files, move them to Archive/yyyy-mm-dd/filename_HHmmss 
- Using internal pipeline

content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 10 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://asapractice01tw002.dfs.core.windows.net/training/Source_Data/StoreDemoGraphics.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV', HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result];

SELECT
    COUNT(*) as [row_count]
    , MAX(storeId) as [max_id]
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://asapractice01tw002.dfs.core.windows.net/training/Source_Data/StoreDemoGraphics.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV', HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result];

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 10 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://asapractice01tw002.dfs.core.windows.net/training/Source_Data/yellow_tripdata_2023-01.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

#Cleansing - Clean unwanted spaces.

for column in df.columns:
        df = df.withColumn(column, rtrim(ltrim(col(column))))

# Remove any null rows
df = df.dropna()

# Remove duplicate records if any
df = df.dropDuplicates()

# Linking Dependency
'''
from azure.identity import ClientSecretCredential 
from azure.mgmt.resource import ResourceManagementClient
from azure.mgmt.datafactory import DataFactoryManagementClient
from azure.mgmt.datafactory.models import *
from datetime import datetime, timedelta
import time

# Create a trigger
'''
    tr_name = 'mytrigger'
    scheduler_recurrence = ScheduleTriggerRecurrence(frequency='Minute', interval='15',start_time='2017-12-12T04:00:00Z', end_time='2017-12-12T05:00:00Z', time_zone='UTC')
    pipeline_parameters = {'inputPath':'adftutorial/input', 'outputPath':'adftutorial/output'}
    pipelines_to_run = []
    pipeline_reference = PipelineReference('copyPipeline')
    pipelines_to_run.append(TriggerPipelineReference(pipeline_reference, pipeline_parameters))
    tr_properties = TriggerResource(properties=ScheduleTrigger(description='My scheduler trigger', pipelines = pipelines_to_run, recurrence=scheduler_recurrence))
    adf_client.triggers.create_or_update(rg_name, df_name, tr_name, tr_properties)

    # Start the trigger
    adf_client.triggers.start(rg_name, df_name, tr_name)
'''
print("Hallo")

#StorageAccount = ""

#Path = ""
#GoldDeltaPath= ""
ReadPath  = 'abfss://' + TargetContainer + '@' + StorageAccount + '.dfs.core.windows.net/' + Path
WritePath  = 'abfss://' + TargetContainer + '@' + StorageAccount + '.dfs.core.windows.net/' + GoldDeltaPath

# lets replace the device_key with hashing hash(col(('device_name')): 
dimDeviceDF = dimDeviceDF.withColumn('device_key', abs(hash(trim('device_name'))))
dimDeviceDF = dimDeviceDF.withColumnRenamed('device_name','device')

print(dimDeviceDF)
dimDeviceDF.show()

#Setting vars:
#container_name = "data"

print(f"Base Path: {base_io_path}")
print(f"Execution Complete on {spark_pool_name}:{spark_executor_size}")

ReadPath  = 'abfss://' + TargetContainer + '@' + StorageAccount + '.dfs.core.windows.net/' + Path
